text: wmn yaetad ealaa muwmin fyqtlh ean eamad bighayr haqin feaqbth jhnm, khaldana fiha mae sakhit allah taealaa ealayh wtardih min rhmth, 'iina jazah ealaa dhanbih waedd allah lah 'ashadi aleadhab bsbb ma artkbh min hadhih aljnayt alezym. wlknh subhanah yaefu wytfdl ela ahl al'iiman fala yjazyhm balkhlwd fi jhnm
